snippet: In addition to pensions, the N.F.L. and the N.B.A. have transition programs for former athletes done playing and Major League Baseball is working on one.
abstract: National Football League and National Basketball Association have transition programs for former athletes, whose finances often derail after retirement due to a mix of immaturity, dubious investments, overspending and poor financial planning; Major League Baseball is working on a similar program.
lead_paragraph: In addition to pensions, the N.F.L. and the N.B.A. have transition programs for former athletes done playing and Major League Baseball is working on one.

headline.seo: Pro Leagues Help Ex-Players Adapt After the Glory
headline.main: Help for Pro Athletes When the Cheers Stop
headline.print_headline: Help for Pro Athletes When the Cheering Stops
